mapper.select:
select board_no as boardNo , title , contents , count , secret_yn as secretYn , member_no as memberNo ,(select name from member where member_no = b.member_no) memberName , reg_dt as regDt from board b where 1=1
or title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') or contents like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
order by board_no desc limit #{page}, 10
